about.label: About
about.personalIntro: I've helped hundreds of teams cut manual work by 70%+ using n8n, AI agents, and workflows that actually make sense.
about.mission: My job? Taking the 'it's complicated' out of automation. Whether you're a startup drowning in spreadsheets or an enterprise with 50 disconnected tools, I build systems that just work.
about.proofPodcast: Weekly podcast reaching devs in 12+ countries

mission.description: Making complex technology accessible and helping teams leverage automation to focus on what matters most. Bridging the gap between cutting-edge capabilities and practical business solutions.
